original_title: Das Leben des Jürgen von Golzow
overview: The first life story of one of the "children of Golzow", continued beyond the "Wende" as an independent feature-length film, which tells of the career of the first hero of our first film, using the rich material available from Jürgen, who became a painter and upholsterer, and "his" Golzow, where he still lived at the time.
title: Das Leben des Jürgen von Golzow
